GSP31iskgaudu:228: tathā sāvayavaṃ avayavāḥ śabdasparśarasarūpagandhāḥ taiḥ saha /
GSP31iskgaudu:229: kiṃca paratantraṃ nātmanaḥ prabhavati yathā pradhānatantrā buddhiḥ buddhitantro 'haṃkāraḥ ahaṃkāratantrāṇi tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi ca tanmātratantrāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:234: nahi pradhānāt paraṃ kiñcidasti yataḥ pradhānasyānutpattiḥ tasmādahetumadavyaktam /
GSP31iskgaudu:235: tathānityaṃ ca vyaktaṃ nityamavyaktamanutpādyatvāt nahi bhūtāni kutaścidutpadyanteti pradhānam /

GSP31iskgaudu:237: tathā vyaktaṃ liṅgamaliṅgamavyaktaṃ nityatvānmahadādi liṅgaṃ pralayakāle parasparaṃ pralīyate naivaṃ pradhānaṃ tasmādaliṅgaṃ pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:238: tathā sāvayavaṃ vyaktaṃ niravayavamavyaktaṃ nahi śabdasparśarasarūpagandhāḥ pradhāne santi /
GSP31iskgaudu:240: evaṃ vyaktāvyaktayorvaidharmmyamuktaṃ sādharmmyamucyate yaduktaṃ sarūpaṃ ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:242: vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānaṃ tadviparītastathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
GSP31iskgaudu:243: triguṇaṃ vyaktaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇā yasyeti /
GSP31iskgaudu:245: idaṃ vyaktamime guṇā iti na vivekakarttuṃ yāti ayaṃ gaurayamaśva iti yathā ye guṇāstadvyaktaṃ yadvyaktaṃ te ca guṇā iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:246: tathā viṣayo vyaktaṃ bhojyamityarthaḥ sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ viṣayabhūtatvāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:249: tathā prasavadharmi vyaktaṃ tadyathā buddherahaṃkāraḥ prasūyate tasmāt pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi ca prasūyante tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni
GSP31iskgaudu:250: evamete vyaktadharmāḥ prasavadharmāntā uktā evamebhiravyaktaṃ sarūpaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:251: tatra triguṇaṃ vyaktamavyaktamapi triguṇaṃ yasyaitanmahadādi kāryaṃ triguṇam /
GSP31iskgaudu:252: iha yadātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ kāryamiti yathā kṛṣṇatantukṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa eva paṭo bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:253: tathāviveki vyaktaṃ pradhānamapi guṇairna bhidyate anye guṇā anyat pradhānameva vivaktuṃ na yāti tadaviveki pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:254: tathā viṣayo vyaktaṃ pradhānamapi sarvapuruṣaviṣayabhūtatvādviṣaya iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:256: tathācetanaṃ vyaktaṃ pradhānamapi sukhaduḥkhamohānna cetayatīti kathamanumīyata iha hyacetanānmṛtpiṇḍādacetano ghaṭā utpadyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:264: acetanaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohāṃścetayati saṃjānīte tasmāccetanaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:265: prasavadharmi vyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ cāprasavadharmī puruṣo nahi kiñcit puruṣāt prasūyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:268: tat pūrvasyāmāryāyāṃ pradhānamahetumadyathā vyākhyātaṃ tathā ca pumān tadyathā hetumadananityamityādi
GSP31iskgaudu:269: vyaktaṃ tadviparītamavyaktaṃ tatra hetumadvyaktamahetumat pradhānaṃ tathā ca pumānahetumānanutpādyatvāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:270: anityaṃ vyaktaṃ nityaṃ pradhānaṃ tathā ca nityaḥ pumān /
GSP31iskgaudu:274: liṅgaṃ vyaktamaliṅgaṃ pradhānaṃ tathā ca pumānapyaliṅgaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:276: sāvayavaṃ vyaktaṃ niravayavamavyaktaṃ tathā ca pumān niravayavaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:278: kiṃca paratantraṃ vyaktaṃ svatantramavyaktaṃ tathā ca pumānapi svatantraḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:281: vyaktapradhānayoḥ sādharmyaṃ puruṣasya vaidharmyaṃ ca triguṇamavivekītyādi prakṛtyāryāyāṃ vyākhyātam // 11 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:282: tatra yaduktaṃ triguṇamiti vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca tat ke te guṇā iti tat svarūpapratipādanāyedamāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:286: tatra prītyātmakaṃ sattvaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ tadātmakamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:291: arthaḥ śabdaḥ sāmarthyavācī prakāśārthaṃ sattvaṃ prakāśasamarthamityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:292: pravṛttyarthaṃ rajo niyamārthaṃ tamaḥ sthitau samarthamityarthaḥ prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlā guṇā iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:294: anyonyābhibhavāḥ anyonyāśrayāḥ anyonyajananāḥ anyonyamithunāḥ anyonyavṛttayaśca te tathoktāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:296: yathā yadā sattvamutkaṭaṃ bhavati tadā rajastamasī aprītipravṛttidharmmeṇa yadā tamastadā
GSP31iskgaudu:300: tathānyonyamithunāśca yathā strīpuṃsau anyonyamithunau tathā guṇāḥ / uktaṃ ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:301: rajaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:304: anyonyavṛttayaśca parasparaṃ varttante guṇāḥ guṇeṣu varttanta iti vacanāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:305: yathā surūpā suśīlā strī sarvvasukhahetuḥ sapatnīnāṃ saiva duḥkhahetuḥ saiva rāgiṇāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:306: mohaṃ janayati eva satvaṃ rajastamasorvṛttiheturyathā rājā sadodyuktaḥ prajāpālane
GSP31iskgaudu:307: duṣṭanigrahe śiṣṭānāṃ sukhamutpādayati duṣṭānāṃ duḥkhaṃ mohaṃ ca evaṃ rajassattvatamasorvṛttiṃ janayati /
GSP31iskgaudu:308: tathā tamaḥ svarūpeṇāvaraṇātmakena sattvarajasorvṛttiṃ janayati yathā meghāḥ khamāvṛtya
GSP31iskgaudu:309: jagataḥ sukhamutpādayanti te vṛṣṭyā karṣukāṇāṃ karṣaṇodyogaṃ janayanti virahiṇāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:312: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:313: guru varaṇakameva tamaḥ pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
GSP31iskgaudu:314: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakaṃ ca yadā sattvamutkaṭaṃ bhavati tadā laghūnyaṅgāni buddhiprakāśaśca prasannatendriyāṇāṃ bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:315: upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ upaṣṭambhātītyupaṣṭambhakamudyotakaṃ yathā vṛṣo vṛṣadarśane utkaṭamupaṣṭambhaṃ karoti eva rajovṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:316: tathā rajaśca calaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ rajovṛttiścalacitto bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:317: guru varaṇamekameva tamaḥ yadā tama utkaṭaṃ bhavati tadā gurūṇyaṅgānyāvṛtānīndriyāṇi bhavanti svārthāsamarthāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:318: atrāha yadi guṇāḥ parasparaṃ viruddhāḥ svamatenaiva kamarthaṃ niṣpādayanti tarhi
GSP31iskgaudu:319: kathaṃ pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ pradīpena tulyaṃ pradīpavadarthataḥ sādhanā vṛttiriṣṭā
GSP31iskgaudu:322: antarapraśno bhavati triguṇamaviveki viṣaya ityādi pradhānaṃ vyaktaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ tatra pradhānamupalabhyamānaṃ mahadādi ca triguṇamavivekyādīti ca kathamavagamyate tatrāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:329: evaṃ vyaktāvyaktasampanno bhavati dūraṃ pradhānamāsannaṃ vyaktaṃ yo vyaktaṃ paśyati sa pradhānamapi paśyati tadviparyayābhāvāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:331: loke yadātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ kāryamapi tathā kṛṣṇebhyastantubhyaḥ kṛṣṇa eva paṭo bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:332: evaṃ mahadādiliṅgamavivekiviṣayaḥ sāmānyacetanaṃ prasavadharmi yadātmakaṃ liṅgaṃ tadātmakamavyaktamapi siddham // 14 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:334: evaṃ kāraṇaguṇātmakatvāt kāryasyāvyaktamapi siddhamityetanmithyā loke yannopalabhyate tannāsti evaṃ pradhānamapyasti kiṃ tu nopalabhyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:338: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāloke yatra karttāsti tasya parimāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā kulālaḥ parimitairmṛtpiṇḍaiḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:339: parimitāneva ghaṭān karoti evaṃ mahadapi mahadādiliṅgaṃ parimitaṃ bhedataḥ pradhānakāryamekā
GSP31iskgaudu:340: buddhireko 'haṃkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi
GSP31iskgaudu:341: pañcamahābhūtānītyevaṃ bhedānāṃ parimāṇādasti pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadvyaktaṃ parimitamutpādayati /
GSP31iskgaudu:342: yadi pradhānaṃ na syāttadā niḥparimāṇamidaṃ vyaktamapi na syāt parimāṇācca bhedānāmasti pradhānaṃ yasmādvyaktamutpannam /
GSP31iskgaudu:343: tathā samanvayādiha loke prasiddhirdṛṣṭā yathā vratadhāriṇaṃ baṭuṃ dṛṣṭvā samanvayati
GSP31iskgaudu:344: nūnamasya pitarau brāhmaṇāviti evamidaṃ triguṇaṃ mahadādiliṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhayāmo
GSP31iskgaudu:345: 'sya yat kāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ samanvayādasti pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:346: tathā śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca iha yo yasmin śaktaḥ sa tasminnevārthe pravarttate yathā kulālo ghaṭāsya karaṇe samartho ghaṭameva karoti na paṭaṃ rathaṃ vā /
GSP31iskgaudu:350: kāraṇasya kāryasya ca vibhāgo yathā ghaṭo dadhimadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇe samartho na tathā taktāraṇaṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:351: mṛtpiṇḍo vā ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati na caivaṃ ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍam /
GSP31iskgaudu:353: asti vibhaktaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ yasya vibhāga idaṃ vyaktamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:354: itaśca avibhāgādvaiśvarūpasya viśvaṃ jagat tasya rūpaṃ vyaktiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:355: viśvarūpasya bhāvo vaiśvarūpaṃ tasyāvibhāgādasti pradhānaṃ yasmātrailokyasya pañcānāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:356: pṛthivyādīnāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ parasparaṃ vibhāgo nāsti mahābhūteṣvantarbhūtāstrayo lokā
GSP31iskgaudu:357: iti pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśamiti etāni pañcamahābhūtāni pralayakāle sṛṣṭikrameṇaivāvibhāgaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:358: yānti tanmātreṣu pariṇāmiṣu tanmātrāṇyekādaśendriyāṇi cāhaṃkāre ahaṃkāro buddhau
GSP31iskgaudu:359: buddhiḥ pradhāne evaṃ trayo lokāḥ pralayakāle prakṛtāvavibhāgaṃ gacchanti tasmādavibhāgāt
GSP31iskgaudu:365: triguṇataḥ triguṇāt sattvarajastamoguṇā yasmiṃstattriguṇaṃ tatkimuktaṃ bhavati sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:366: tathā samudayāt yathā gaṃgāśrotāṃsi triṇī rudramūrddhani patitāni ekaṃ sroto janayati
GSP31iskgaudu:367: evaṃ triguṇamavyaktamekaṃ vyaktaṃ janayati tathā vā tantavaḥ samuditāḥ paṭaṃ janayanti
GSP31iskgaudu:368: evamavyaktaṃ gunasamudayānmahadādi janayatīti triguṇataḥ samudayācca vyaktaṃ jagat pravarttate /
GSP31iskgaudu:370: naiṣa doṣaḥ pariṇāmataḥ salilavat pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣādekasmāt pradhānāt trayo
GSP31iskgaudu:371: lokāḥ samutpannāstulyabhāvā na bhavanti devāḥ sukhena yuktā manuṣyā duḥkhena tiryañco
GSP31iskgaudu:372: mohena ekasmāt pradhānāt pravṛttaṃ vyaktaṃ pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣāt pariṇamātaḥ salilavadbhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:375: pariṇāmāt pravarttate vyaktaṃ yathā ākāśādekarasaṃ salilaṃ patitaṃ nānārūpātsaṃśleṣādbhidyate
GSP31iskgaudu:376: tadrasāntarairevamekasmāt pradhānāt pravṛttāstrayo lokā naikasvabhāvā bhavanti deveṣu
GSP31iskgaudu:377: sattvamutkaṭaṃ rajastamasī udāsīne tena te 'tyantasukhino manuṣyeṣu raja utkaṭaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:378: bhavati sattvatamasī udāsīne tena te 'tyantaduḥkhino tiryakṣu tama utkaṭaṃ bhavati
GSP31iskgaudu:384: yaduktaṃ vyaktāvyaktavijñānānmokṣaḥ prāpyata iti tatra vyaktādanantaramavyaktaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairadhigatamavyaktavat puruṣo 'pi sūkṣmastasyādhunānumitāstitvaṃ pratikriyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:386: yo 'yaṃ mahadādi saṃghātaḥ sa puruṣārtha ityanumīyate acetanatvāt paryaṅgavat /
GSP31iskgaudu:387: yathā paryaṅka pratyekaṃ gātrotpalakapādavaṭatūlīprachādanapaṭopadhānasaṃghataḥ parārtho nahi svārthaḥ paryaṅkasya nahi kiñcidapi gātrotpalādyavayavānāṃ parasparaṃ kṛtyamasti /
GSP31iskgaudu:388: ato 'vagamyate 'sti puruṣo yaḥ paryaṅke śete yasyārthaṃ paryaṅkastatparārthamidaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:389: śarīraṃ pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ saṃghāto varttate 'sti puruṣo yasyedaṃ bhogyaśarīraṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:391: itaścātmāsti triguṇādiviparyayāt yaduktaṃ pūrvasyāmāryāyāṃ trigunamavivekiviṣaya ityādi /
GSP31iskgaudu:394: tathā coktaṃ ṣaṣṭhitantre puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ pravarttate /
GSP31iskgaudu:396: yathā madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaṣaḍrasopabṛṃhitsya saṃyktasyānnasya sādhyate evaṃ mahadādiliṅgasya bhoktṛtvābhāvādasti sa ātmā yasyedaṃ bhogyaṃ śarīramti /
GSP31iskgaudu:397: itaśca kaivalyārthama pravṛtteśca kevalasya bhāvaḥ kaivalyaṃ tannimitaṃ yā ca pravṛttistasyāḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:398: svakaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtteḥ sakāśādanumīyate astyātmeti yato sarvo vidvānavidvāṃśca
GSP31iskgaudu:401: atha sa kimekaha sarvaśarīre 'dhiṣṭhātā maṇirasanātmakasūtravat āhosvidbahava ātmānaḥ pratiśarīramadhiṣṭhātāra ityatrocyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:404: janma ca maraṇaṃ ca karaṇāni ca janmamaraṇakaraṇāni teṣāṃ pratiniyamāt pratyekaniyamādityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:405: yadyeka eva ātmā syāttata ekasya janmani sarva eva jāyeran ekasya maraṇe sarve 'pi
GSP31iskgaudu:407: badhirāndhakuṇikhaṃjāḥ syurna caivaṃ bhavati tasmājjanmamaraṇakaraṇānāṃ pratiniyamāt
GSP31iskgaudu:409: itaścāyugapat pravṛtteśca yugapadekakālaṃ na yugapadayugapat pravarttanaṃ yasmādayugapaddharmādiṣu
GSP31iskgaudu:410: pravṛttirdṛśyate eke dharme pravṛttā anye 'dharme vairāgye 'nye jñāne 'nye pravṛttāḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:413: yathā sāmānye janmani ekaḥ sāttvikaḥ sukhī /
GSP31iskgaudu:421: vivekī bhoktetyādiguṇānāṃ puruṣasya yo viparyāsa uktastasmāt sattvarajastamaḥsu karttṛbhūteṣu
GSP31iskgaudu:422: sākṣitvaṃ siddhaṃ puruṣasyeti yo 'yamadhikṛto bahutvaṃ prati /
GSP31iskgaudu:423: guṇā eva karttāraḥ pravarttante sākṣī na pravattate nāpi nivarttata eva /
GSP31iskgaudu:427: yathā kaścit parivrājako grāmīṇeṣu karṣaṇārtheṣu pravṛtteṣu kevalo madhyasthaḥ puruṣo 'pyevaṃ guṇeṣu varttamāneṣu na pravarttate /
GSP31iskgaudu:429: karmaṇāmiti sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ karmakarttṛbhāvena pravarttante na puruṣa
GSP31iskgaudu:431: yasmātkarttā puruṣastatkathamadhyavasāyaṃ karoti dharmaṃ kariṣyāmyadharmaṃ na kariṣyāmītyataḥ karttā bhavati na ca karttā puruṣa evamubhayātra doṣaḥ syāditi // 19 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:435: iha puruṣaścetanākṛt tena cetanāvabhāsaṃ yuktaṃ mahadādiliṅgaṃ cetanāvadiva bhavati
GSP31iskgaudu:436: yathā loke ghaṭāḥ śītasaṃyuktaḥ śīta uṣṇasaṃyukta uṣṇa evaṃ mahadādi liṅgaṃ tasya
GSP31iskgaudu:437: saṃyogāt puruṣasaṃyogāccetanāvadiva bhavati tasmādguṇā adhyavasāyaṃ kurvanti na puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:438: yadyapi loke puruṣaḥ karttā gaṃtetyādi prayujyate tathāpyakarttā puruṣaḥ kathaṃ guṇakarttṛtve
GSP31iskgaudu:439: ca tathā kartteva bhavatyudāsīno guṇānāṃ karttṛtve sati udāsīno 'pi puruṣaḥ kartteva bhavati na karttā /
GSP31iskgaudu:440: atra dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathācauraścauraiḥ saha gṛhītaścaura ityavagamyata evaṃ trayo guṇāḥ karttārastaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ puruṣo 'karttāpi karttā bhavati karttṛsaṃyogāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:442: athaitayoḥ pradhānapuruṣayoḥ kiṃ hetuḥ saṃghāta ucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:445: puruṣasya pradhānena saha saṃyogo darśanārthaṃ prakṛtiṃ mahadādikāryabhūtaparyantaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati etadarthaṃ pradhānasyāpi puruṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:446: kaivalyārthaṃ sa ca saṃyogaḥ paṅgvandhavadubhayorapi draṣṭavyaḥ yathā ekaḥ paṅgurekaścāndha
GSP31iskgaudu:447: etau dvāvapi gacchantau mahatā sāmarthyenāṭavyāṃ sārthasya stenakṛtādupaplavāt svabandhuparityakto
GSP31iskgaudu:448: daivāditaśceruśca svagatyā ca tau saṃyogamupayātau punastayoḥ svavacaso viśvastatvena
GSP31iskgaudu:449: saṃyogo gamanārthaṃ darśanārthaṃ ca bhavatyandhena paṃguḥ skandhamāropitaḥ evaṃ śarīrārūḍhapaṃgudarśitena
GSP31iskgaudu:451: evaṃ puruṣe darśanaśaktirasti paṃguvannakriyā pradhāne kriyāśaktirastyandhavannadarśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:453: pradhānamapi puruṣasya mokṣaṃ kṛtvā nivarttate puruṣo 'pi pradhānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaivalyaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:455: kiṃ cānyat tatkṛtaḥ sargastena saṃyogena kṛtastatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:456: yathā strī puruṣasaṃyogāt sutotpattistataḥ pradhānapuruṣasaṃyogāt sargasyotpattiḥ // 21 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:460: prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ brahma avyaktaṃ bahudhānakaṃ māyeti paryāyāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:461: aliṅgasyāḥ prakṛteḥ sakāśānmahānutpadyate mahān buddhirāsurī matiḥ khyātirjñānaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:463: 'bhimāna iti paryāyāḥ tasmādgaṇaśca ṣoḍaśakaḥ tasmādahaṃkārācchoḍaśakaḥ ṣoḍaśasvarūpeṇa guṇa utpadyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:465: pañcatanmātrāṇi śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rupatanmātraṃ rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātramiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:467: tata ekādaśendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇamiti pañca buddhīndriyāṇi /
GSP31iskgaudu:468: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ pañcakarmendriyāṇyubhayātmakamekādaśaṃ mana eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇo 'haṃkārādutpadyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:469: kiṃca pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni tasmācchoḍaśakādgaṇāt pañcabhyastanmātrebhyaḥ sakāśāt pañca vai mahābhūtānyutpadyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:470: yaduktaṃ śabdatanmātrādākāśaṃ sparśatanmātrādvāyuḥ rūpatanmātrāttejaḥ rasatanmātrādāpaḥ gandhatanmātrāt pṛthivī evaṃ pañcabhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtānyutpadyante // 22 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:471: yaduktaṃ vyaktāvyaktajñavijñānānmokṣa iti tatra mahadādibhūtāntaṃ trayoviṃśatibhedaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:473: evametāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni yastrailokyaṃ vyāptaṃ jānāti tasya bhāvo 'stitvaṃ tattvaṃ yathoktam /
GSP31iskgaudu:475: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:476: tāni yathā prakṛtiḥ puruṣo buddhirahaṃkāraḥ pañcatanmātrā ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ityetāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:477: tatroktaṃ prakṛtermahānutpadyate tasya mahataḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇamityetadāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:482: ghaṭo 'yaṃ paṭa ityevaṃ syati yā sā buddhiriti lakṣyate sā ca buddhiraṣṭāṅgikā sāttvikatāmasarūpabhedāt
GSP31iskgaudu:483: tatra buddheḥ sāttvikaṃ rūpaṃ caturvidhaṃ bhavati dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:484: ceti tatra dharmo nāma dayādānayamaniyamalakṣaṇastatra yamā niyamāśca pātañjale 'bhihitā
GSP31iskgaudu:486: jñānaṃ prakāśo 'vagamo bhānamiti paryāyāstacca dvividhaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ceti tatra
GSP31iskgaudu:487: bāhyaṃ nāma vedāḥ śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chandojyotiṣākhyaṣaḍaṅgasahitāḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:489: ābhyantaraṃ prakṛtipuruṣajñānamiyaṃ prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthāyaṃ puruṣaḥ siddho nirguṇovyāpī cetana iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:491: ābhyantareṇa jñānena mokṣa ityarthaḥ vairāgyamapi dvividhaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ca
GSP31iskgaudu:493: pradhānamapyatra svapnendrajālasadṛśamiti viraktasya gokṣepsoryadutpadyate tadābhyantaraṃ vairāgyam /
GSP31iskgaudu:494: aiśvaryamīśvarabhāvastaccāṣṭaguṇamaṇimā mahimā garimā laghimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvaṃ ceti /
GSP31iskgaudu:502: yatra kāmāvasāyitvaṃ brahmādistambaparyantaṃ yatra kāmastatraivāsya svecchayā sthānāsanavihārānācaratīti /
GSP31iskgaudu:503: catvāra etāni buddheḥ sāttvikāni rūpāṇi yadā sattvena rajastamasī abhibhūte tadā pumān buddhiguṇān dharmādīnāpnoti /
GSP31iskgaudu:509: ekādaśakaśca gaṇa ekādaśendriyāṇi tathā tanmātro gaṇaḥ pañcakaḥ pañcalakṣaṇopetaḥ śabdatanmātrasparśatanmātrarūpatanmātrarasatanmātragandhatanmātralakṣaṇopetaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:513: sattvenābhibhūte yadā rajastamasī ahaṃkāre bhavatastadā so 'haṃkāraḥ sāttvikastasya ca pūrvācāryaiḥ saṃjñā kṛtā vaikṛta iti tasmādvikṛtādahaṃkārādekādaśaka indriyagaṇa utpadyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:514: tasmāt sāttvikāni viśuddhānīndriyāṇi svaviṣayasamarthāni tasmāducyate sāttvika ekādaśaka iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:515: kiṃcānyadbhūtādestanmātraḥ sa tāmasaḥ tamasābhibhūte sattvarajasī ahaṃkāre yadā bhavataḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:516: so 'haṃkārastāmasa ucyate tasya pūrvācāryakṛtā saṃjñā bhūtādistasmādbhūtāderahaṃkārāttanmātraḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:517: pañcako gaṇa utpadyate bhūtānāmādibhūtastamobahulastenoktaḥ sa tāmasa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:518: tasmādbhūtādeḥ pañcatanmātrako gaṇaḥ kiṃca taijasādubhayaṃ yadārajasābhibhūte sattvatamasī
GSP31iskgaudu:519: bhavatastadā tasmāt so 'haṃkārastaijasa iti saṃjñāṃ labhate tasmāttaijasādubhayamutpadyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:521: yo 'yaṃ sāttviko 'haṃkāro vaikṛtiko vaikṛto bhūtvā ekādaśendriyāṇyutpādayati sa taijasamahaṃkāraṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:522: sahāyaṃ gṛhṇāti sāttviko niṣkriyaḥ sa taijasayukta indriyotpattau samarthaḥ tathā
GSP31iskgaudu:523: tāmaso 'haṃkāro bhūtādiḥ saṃjñito niṣkriyatvāttaijasenāhaṃkāreṇa kriyāvatā yuktastanmātrāṇyutpādayati
GSP31iskgaudu:526: ekādaśaka ityuktaḥ yo vaikṛtāt sāttvikādahaṃkārādutpadyate tasya kā saṃjñetyāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:530: spṛśyate aneneti sparśanaṃ tvagindriyaṃ tadvācī siddhaḥ sparśanaśabdo 'sti tenedaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:531: paṭhyate sparśanakānīti śabdasparśarūparasagandhān pañcaviṣayān budhyante avagacchantīti
GSP31iskgaudu:534: tatra vāgvadati hastau nānāvyāpāraṃ kurutaḥ pādau gamanāgamanaṃ pāyurutsargaṃ karoti upastha ānaṃdaṃ prajotpattyā // 26 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:535: evaṃ buddhīndriyakarmendriyabhedena daśendriyāṇi vyākhyātāni mana ekādaśakaṃ kimātmakaṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ceti taducyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:538: atrendriyavarge mana ubhayātmakaṃ buddhīndriyeṣu buddhīndriyavat karmendriyeṣu karmendriyavat
GSP31iskgaudu:539: kasmādbuddhīndriyāṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ kalpayati karmendriyāṇāṃ ca tasmādubhayātmakaṃ manaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:542: karmendriyāṇi manasā sahotpadyamānāni manasaḥ sādharmyaṃ prati tasmātsādharmyānmano
GSP31iskgaudu:546: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ śabdādayo vṛttayaḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ vacanādayo 'thaitānīndriyāṇi bhinnāni
GSP31iskgaudu:547: bhinnārthagrāhakāṇi kimīśvareṇota svabhāvena kṛtāni yataḥ pradhānabuddhyahaṃkārā
GSP31iskgaudu:552: pañcānāṃ saṃkalpaśca manasa evamete bhinnānāmevendriyāṇāmarthāḥ guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣāt
GSP31iskgaudu:553: guṇānāṃ pariṇāmo guṇapariṇāmastasya viśeṣādindriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ bāhyārthabhedāśca /
GSP31iskgaudu:554: athaitannānātvaṃ neśvareṇa nāhaṃkāreṇa na buddhyā na pradhānena na puruṣeṇa svabhāvāt kṛtaguṇapariṇāmeneti /
GSP31iskgaudu:555: guṇānāmacetanatvānna pravarttate pravarttata eva kathaṃ vakṣyatīhaiva vatsavivṛddhinimittaṃ kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttirajñasya puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya /
GSP31iskgaudu:556: evamacetanaguṇāḥ ekādaśendriyabhāvena pravarttante viśeṣā api tatkṛtā eva yenoccaiḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:557: pradeśe cakṣuḥkhalokanāya sthitaṃ tathā ghrāṇaṃ tathā śrotraṃ tathā jihvā svadeśe svārthagrahaṇāya /
GSP31iskgaudu:558: evaṃ karmendriyāṇyapi yathāyathaṃ svārthasamarthāni svadeśāvasthitāni svabhāvato guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣādeva na tadarthā api yata uktaṃ śāstrāntare
GSP31iskgaudu:559: guṇā guṇeṣu varttante guṇānāṃ yā vṛttiḥ sā guṇaviṣayā eveti bāhyārthā vijñeyā guṇakṛtā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:565: aviśeṣavyāvṛtyartho yathā bhikṣā mātraṃ labhyate nānyo viśeṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:566: tatha cakṣū rūpamatre na rasādiṣu evaṃ śeṣāṇyapi tadyathā cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ jihvāyā raso ghrāṇasya gandhaḥ śrotrasya śabdaḥ tvacaḥ sparśaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:567: evameṣāṃ buddhīndriyāṇāṃ vṛttiḥ kathitā karmendriyāṇāṃ vṛttiḥ kathyate vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāśca pañcānāṃ karmendriyāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:568: vāco vacanaṃ hastayorādānaṃ pādayorviharaṇaṃ pāyorbhuktasyāhārasya pariṇatamalotsargaḥ upasthasyānandaḥ sutotpattirviṣayā vṛttiriti sambandhaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:573: adhyavasāyo yo buddhiriti lakṣaṇamuktaṃ saiva buddhivṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:575: saṃkalpakaṃ mana iti lakṣaṇamuktaṃ tena saṃkalpa eva manaso vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:576: trayasya buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ svālakṣaṇyā vṛttirasāmānyā yā prāgabhihitā buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca vṛttiḥ sāpyasāmānyaiveti /
GSP31iskgaudu:578: sāmānyakāranavṛttiḥ sāmānyena karaṇānāṃ vṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānā iti pañca vāyavaḥ sarvendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyā vṛttiryataḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:579: prāṇo nāma vāyurmukhanāsikāntargocarastasya yat spandanaṃ karma tat trayodaśavidhasyāpi sāmānyā vṛttiḥ sati prāṇe yasmāt karaṇānāmātmalābha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:583: tathā samāno madhyadeśavartī ya āhārādinayanātsamaṃ nayanāt samāno vāyustatra yatspandanaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ karaṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:584: tathā ūrdhvārohaṇādutkarṣādunnayanādvā udāno nābhideśamastakāntargocarastatrodāne yatspandanaṃ tat sarvendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:585: kiṃca śarīravyāptirabhyantaravibhāgaśca yena kriyate 'sau śarīravyāptyākāśavadvyānastatra yat spandanaṃ tat karaṇajālasya sāmānyā vṛttiriti
GSP31iskgaudu:586: evamete pañca vāyavaḥ sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiriti vyākhyātāḥ trayodaśavidhasyāpi karaṇasāmānyā vṛttirityarthaḥ // 29 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:587: yugapaccatuṣṭayasya tu vṛttiḥ kramaśaśca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
GSP31iskgaudu:588: dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31iskgaudu:595: kiṃca kramaśaśca tasya nirdiṣṭā tasyeti catuṣṭayasyakramaśaśca vṛttirbhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:596: yathā kaścit pathi gacchan dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣo veti saṃśaye sati tatroparūḍhāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:597: valliṃ talliṅgaṃ paśyati śakuniṃ vā tato tasya manasā saṃkalpite saṃśaye vyavacchedabhūtā
GSP31iskgaudu:599: kramaśo vṛttirdṛṣṭā yathā rūpe tathā śabdādiṣvapi boddhavyā dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭaviṣaye /
GSP31iskgaudu:600: kiṃcānyattathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiradṛṣṭe 'nāgate 'tīte ca kāle buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:601: rūpe cakṣuḥ pūrvikā trayasya vṛttiḥ sparśe tvakpūrvikā gandhe ghrāṇapūrvikā rase
GSP31iskgaudu:602: rasanapūrvikā śabde śravaṇapūrvikā buddhyahaṃkāramanasāmanāgate bhaviṣyati kāle 'tīte
GSP31iskgaudu:606: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31iskgaudu:607: svāṃ svāmiti vīpsā buddhyahaṃkāramanāṃsi svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ parasparākūtahetukāmākūtakādarāsambhrama iti pratipadyante puruṣārthakaraṇāya /
GSP31iskgaudu:608: buddherahaṃkārādayo buddhirahaṃkārākūtaṃ jñātvā svasvaviṣayaṃ pratipadyate kimarthamiti
GSP31iskgaudu:609: cet puruṣārtha eva hetuḥ puruṣārthaḥ karttavya ityevamarthaṃ guṇānāṃ pravṛttistasmādetāni
GSP31iskgaudu:610: karaṇāni puruṣārthaṃ prakāśayanti kathaṃ svayaṃ pravartante na kenacit kāryate karaṇaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:611: puruṣārtha evaikaḥ kārayatīti vākyārtho na kenacidīśvareṇa puruṣeṇa kāryate prabodhyate karaṇam // 31 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:614: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
GSP31iskgaudu:615: karaṇaṃ mahadādi trayodaśavidhaṃ boddhyavyaṃ pañcabuddhīndriyāṇi cakṣurādīni pañca
GSP31iskgaudu:616: karmendriyāṇi vāgādīnīti trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ tatkiṃ karotītyetadāha tadāharaṇadhāraṇaprakāśakaram /
GSP31iskgaudu:617: tatrāharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca karmendriyāṇi kurvanti prakāśaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi /
GSP31iskgaudu:619: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā tasya karaṇasya kāryaṃ kartavyamiti daśadhā daśaprakāraṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:622: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31iskgaudu:625: daśadhā bāhyaṃ ca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi pañca daśavidhametatkaraṇaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:626: bāhyaṃ tatra yasyāntaḥkaraṇasya viṣayākhyaṃ buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ bhogyaṃ sāmpratakālaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:627: śrotraṃ varttamānameva śabdaṃ śṛṇoti nātītaṃ na ca bhaviṣyantaṃ cakṣurapi vartamānaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:628: rūpaṃ paśyati nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ tvagvarttamānaṃ sparśaṃ jihvā varttamānaṃ rasaṃ nāsikā
GSP31iskgaudu:630: evaṃ karmendriyāṇi vāgvarttamānaṃ śabdamuccārayati nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ pāṇī varttamānaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:631: ghaṭamādadāte nātītamanāgataṃ pāyūpasthau ca varttamānāvutsargānandau kuruto nātītau nānāgatau /
GSP31iskgaudu:632: evaṃ bāhyaṃ karaṇaṃ sāmpratakālamuktaṃ trikālamābhyantaraṃ karaṇaṃ buddhyahaṃkāramanāṃsi trikālaviṣayāṇi buddhirvarttamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ budhyate atītamanāgataṃ ceti /
GSP31iskgaudu:634: tathā mano varttamāne saṃkalpaṃ kurute atīte 'nāgate ca evaṃ trikālamābhyantaraṃ karaṇamiti // 33 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:635: idānīmindriyāṇi kati saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti kāni nirviśeṣamiti taducyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:638: buddhīndriyāṇi tāni saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti saviśeṣaviṣayaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ śabdasparśarūparasagandhān
GSP31iskgaudu:640: prakāśayanti tathā karmendriyāṇāṃ madhye vāgbhavati śabdaviṣayā devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:641: ca vāgvadati ślokādīnuccārayati tasmāddevānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca vāgindriyaṃ tulyaṃ śeṣāṇyapi
GSP31iskgaudu:642: vāgvyatiriktāni pāṇipādapāyūpasthasaṃjñitāni pañcaviṣayāṇi śabdādayo yeṣāṃ tāni pañcaviṣayāṇi
GSP31iskgaudu:643: śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pāṇau santi pañcaśabdādilakṣaṇāyāṃ bhuvi pādo viharati
GSP31iskgaudu:644: pāyvindriyaṃ pañcaklṛptamutsargaṃ karoti tathopasthendriyaṃ pañcalakṣaṇaṃ śukramānandayati // 34 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:646: tasmāttrividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31iskgaudu:647: sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhirahaṃkāramanaḥsahitetyarthaha yasmāt sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate gṛhṇāti
GSP31iskgaudu:648: triṣvapi kāleṣu śabdādīn gṛhṇāti tasmāttrividhama karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi śeṣāni
GSP31iskgaudu:652: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31iskgaudu:653: yāni karaṇānyuktāni ete guṇaviśeṣāḥ kiṃ viśiṣṭāḥ pradīpakalpāḥ pradīpavadviṣayaprakāśakāḥ parasparavilakṣaṇā asadṛśā bhinnaviṣayā ityarthaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:656: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ buddhīndriyāni karmendriyāṇyahaṃkāro manaścaitāni svaṃ svamarthaṃ puruṣasya prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti buddhisthaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:657: yato buddhisthaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ sukhādikaṃ puruṣa upalabhyate // 36 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:660: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi tataḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31iskgaudu:661: sarvendriyagataṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu sarvaṃ pratyupabhogamupabhogaṃ prati devamanuṣyatiryag
GSP31iskgaudu:662: buddhīndriyakarmendriyadvāreṇa sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sādhayati sampādayati yasmāt
GSP31iskgaudu:663: tasmāt saiva ca viśinaṣṭi pradhānapuruṣayorviṣayavibhāgaṃ karoti pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ nānātvamityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:666: puruṣa ebhyo vyatirikta ityeva bodhayati buddhiryasyāvāyādapavargo bhavati // 37 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:667: pūrvamuktaṃ viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇi tat ke viṣayāstacca darśayati /
GSP31iskgaudu:669: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca // ISk_38 //
GSP31iskgaudu:670: yāni pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkārādutpadyante te śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rūpatanmātraṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:671: rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātrametānyaviśeṣā ucyante devānāmete sukhalakṣaṇā viṣayā
GSP31iskgaudu:676: śāntā sukhalakṣaṇā ghorā duḥkhalakṣaṇā mūḍhā mohajanakā yathākāśaṃ kasyacidanavakāśādantargṛhādernirgatasya
GSP31iskgaudu:677: sukhātmakaṃ śāntaṃ bhavati tadeva śītoṣṇavātavarṣābhibhūtasya duḥkhātmakaṃ ghoraṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:678: bhavati tadeva panthānaṃ gacchato vanamārgāt bhraṣṭasya diṅ mohānmūḍhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:679: evaṃ vāyurgharmārtasya śānto bhavati śītārtasya ghoro dhūlīśarkarāvimiśro 'tivān mūḍha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:682: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtaistridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:684: sūkṣmāstanmātrāṇi yatsaṃgṛhītaṃ tanmātrikaṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ mahadādiliṅgaṃ sadā tiṣṭhati
GSP31iskgaudu:685: saṃsarati ca te sūkṣmāstathā mātāpitṛjā sthūlaśarīropacāyakā ṛtukāle mātāpitṛsaṃyoge
GSP31iskgaudu:693: atrāha ke nityāḥ ke vānityāḥ sūkṣmāsteṣāṃ niyatāḥ sūkṣmāstanmātrasaṃjñakāsteṣāṃ madhye
GSP31iskgaudu:695: saṃsarati dharmavaśādindrakādilokeṣvevametanniyataṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ sarati yāvat jñānamutpadyate
GSP31iskgaudu:696: utpanne jñāne vidvāṃñcharīraṃ tyaktvā mokṣaṃ gacchati tasmādete viśeṣā sūkṣmā nityā
GSP31iskgaudu:697: iti mātāpitṛjā nivartante tat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ parityajyehaiva prāṇatyāgavelāyāṃ mātāpitṛjā
GSP31iskgaudu:698: nivartante maraṇakāle mātāpitṛjaṃ śarīramihaiva nivarttya bhūmyādiṣu pralīyate yathā tattvaṃ // 39 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:703: kiṃcānyadasaktaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ tiryagyonidevamānuṣasthāneṣu sūkṣmatvāt kutracidasaktaṃ parvatādiṣvapratihataprasaraṃ sarti gacchati /
GSP31iskgaudu:704: nityaṃ yāvannajñānamutpadyate tāvat saṃsarati tacca mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ mahānādau
GSP31iskgaudu:705: yasya tanmahadādi buddhirahaṃkāro mana iti pañca tanmātrāṇi sūkṣmaparyantaṃ tanmātraparyantaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:707: nirupabhogaṃ bhogarahitaṃ tat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ pitṛmātṛjena bāhyenopacayena kriyādharmagrahaṇāt bhogeṣu samarthaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:709: pralayakāle mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ karaṇopetaṃ pradhāne līyate asaṃsaraṇayuktaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:710: sadā sargakālamatra varttate prakṛtimohabandhanabaddhaṃ sat saṃsaraṇādikriyāsvasamarthamiti
GSP31iskgaudu:712: kiṃ prayojanena trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ saṃsaratītyevaṃ codite satyāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:713: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo yathā vinā chāyā /
GSP31iskgaudu:714: tadvadvinā viśeṣaistiṣṭhati na nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // ISk_41 //
GSP31iskgaudu:715: citraṃ yathā kuḍyāśrayamṛte na tiṣṭhati sthāṇvādibhyaḥ kīlakādibhyo vinā chāyā na tiṣṭhati tairvinā na bhavatyādigrahaṇādyathā śaityaṃ vinā nāpo bhavanti śaityaṃ vādbhirvinā /
GSP31iskgaudu:716: agniruṣṇaṃ vinā vāyuḥ sparśaṃ vinā ākāśamavakāśaṃ vinā pṛthivī gandhaṃ vinā tadvadetena dṛṣṭāntena nyāyana vinā viśeṣairaviśeṣaistanmātrairvinā na tiṣṭhati /
GSP31iskgaudu:717: atha viśeṣabhūtānyucyante śarīraṃ pañcabhūtamayaṃ vaiśeṣiṇā śarīreṇa vinā kva liṅgasthānaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:718: ceti kva ekadehamujjhati tadevānyamāśrayati nirāśrayamāśrayarahitaṃ liṅgaṃ trayodaśa
GSP31iskgaudu:723: puruṣārthaḥ kartavya iti pradhānaṃ pravarttate sa ca dvividhaḥ śabdādyupalabdhilakṣaṇo guṇapuruṣāntaro labdhilakṣaṇaśca /
GSP31iskgaudu:724: śabdādyupalabdhirbrahmādiṣu lokeṣu gandhādibhogāvāptiḥ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhirmokṣa iti tasamāduktaṃ puruṣārthahetukamidaṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ pravarttata iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:726: vakṣyāmaḥ prasaṃgena prasaktyā prakṛteḥ pradhānasya vibhutvayogādyathā rājā svarāṣṭre
GSP31iskgaudu:727: vibhutvādyadyadicchati tattat karotīti tathā prakṛteḥ sarvatra vibhutvayogānnimittanaimittakaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:728: prasaṃgena vyavatiṣṭhate pṛthak pṛthagdehadhāraṇe liṅgasya vyavasthāṃ karoti /
GSP31iskgaudu:729: liṃgaṃ sūkṣmaḥ paramāṇubhistanmātrairūpacitaṃ śarīraṃ trayodaśavidhakaraṇopetaṃ mānuṣadevatiryagyoniṣu
GSP31iskgaudu:730: vyavatiṣṭhate kathaṃ naṭavat yathā naṭaḥ paṭāntareṇa praviśya devo bhūtvā nirgacchati
GSP31iskgaudu:732: evaṃ liṃgaṃ nimittanaimittikaprasaṃgenodarāntaḥ praviśya hastī strī pumān bhavati // 42 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:733: bhāvairadhivāsitaṃ liṃgaṃ saṃsaratītyuktaṃ tat ke bhāvā ityāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:737: tatra sāṃsiddhikā yathā bhavagataḥ kapilasyādisarge utpadyamānasya catvāro bhāvāḥ sahotpannāḥ dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyamaiśvaryamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:738: prākṛtāḥ kathyante brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ putrāḥ sanakasanandanasanātanasanatkumārā babhūvuḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:739: teṣāmutpannakāryakāraṇānāṃ śarīriṇāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇāmete bhāvāścatvāraḥ samutpannāstasmādete prākṛtāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:740: tathā vaikṛtā yathā ācāryamūrttiṃ nimittaṃ kṛtvāsmadādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyate jñānādvairāgyaṃ vairāgyāddharmo dharmādaiśvaryamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:741: ācāryamūrttirapi vikṛtiriti tasmādvaikṛtā ete bhāvā ucyante yairadhivāsitaṃ liṅgaṃ

GSP31iskgaudu:743: vyākhyātā evamaṣṭau dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyamaiśvaryamadharmo 'jñānamavairāgyamanaiśvaryamityaṣṭau bhāvāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:744: etaduktamadhyavasāyo buddhiḥ dharmo jñānamiti kāryaṃ dehastadāśrayāḥ kalalādyā ye mātṛjā ityuktāḥ śukraśoṇitasaṃyoge vivṛddhihetukāḥ kalalādyā budbudamāṃsapeśīprabhṛtayaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:745: tathā kaumārayauvanasthaviratvādayo bhāvā annapānarasanimittā niṣpadyanta ataḥ kāryāśrayiṇa ucyanta annādiviṣayabhoganimittā jāyante // 43 //
GSP31iskgaudu:749: dharmeṇa gamanamūrddhvaṃ dharmaṃ nimittaṃ kṛtvorddhvamupanayati ūrddhvamityaṣṭau sthānāni gṛhyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:751: brāhmaṃ prājāpatyaṃ saumyamaindraṃ gāndharvaṃ rākṣasaṃ paiśācamiti tat sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ gacchati paśumṛgapakṣisarīsṛpasthāvarānteṣvadharmo nimittam
GSP31iskgaudu:752: kiṃca jñānena cāpavargaśca pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ tena nimittenāpavargo mokṣaḥ tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ nivartate paramātmā ucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:753: viparyayādiṣyate bandhaḥ ajñānaṃ nimittaṃ sa caiṣa naimittikaḥ prākṛto vaikāriko dākṣiṇikaśca bandha iti vakṣyati purastāt yadidamuktam /
GSP31iskgaudu:759: yathā kasyacidvairāgyamasti na tattvajñānaṃ tasmādajñānapūrvādvairāgyāt prakṛtilayo
GSP31iskgaudu:760: mṛto 'ṣṭāsu prakṛtiṣu pradhānabuddhyahaṅkāratanmātreṣu līyate na mokṣaḥ tato bhūyo 'pi saṃsarati /
GSP31iskgaudu:761: tathā yo 'yaṃ rājaso rāgaḥ yajāmi dakṣiṇāṃ dadāmi yenāmuṣmiṃlloke 'tra yaddivyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukhamanubhavāmyetasmādrājasādrāgāt saṃsāro bhavati
GSP31iskgaudu:762: tathā aiśvaryādavighātaḥ etadaiśvaryamaṣṭaguṇamaṇimādiyuktaṃ tasmādaiśvaryanimittādavighāto naimittiko bhavati brāhmādiṣu sthāneṣvaiśvaryaṃ na vihanyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:763: kiṃcānyadviparyayādviparyāsaḥ tasyāvighātastasya viparyāso vighāto bhavatyanaiśvaryāt sarvatra vihanyate /

GSP31iskgaudu:765: eṣa nimittaiḥ saha naimittikaḥ ṣoḍaśavidho vyākhyātaḥ /

GSP31iskgaudu:785: pañca viparyayabhedāste yathā tamo moho mahāmohastāmisro 'ndhatāmisra ityeṣāṃ bhedānāṃ nānātvaṃ vakṣyate 'nantarameveti /
GSP31iskgaudu:786: aśaktestvaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā bhavanti karaṇavaikalyāt tānapi vakṣyāmastathā ca tuṣṭirnavadhā ūrddhvasrotasi rājasāni jñānāni /

GSP31iskgaudu:793: tatra līnamātmānaṃ manyate mukto 'hamiti tamo bheda eṣo 'ṣṭavidhasya mohasya bhedo
GSP31iskgaudu:795: yatrāṣṭaguṇamaṇimādyaiśvaryaṃ tatra saṃgādindrādayo devā na mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti punaśca tat kṣaye saṃsarantyeṣo 'ṣṭavidho moha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:796: daśavidho mahāmohaḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhā devānāmete pañcaviṣayāḥ sukhalakṣaṇāḥ mānuṣāṇāmapyete eva śabdādayaḥ pañca viṣayā evameteṣu daśasu mahāmoha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:797: tāmisro 'ṣṭadaśadhāṣṭāvidhamaiśvaryaṃ dṛṣṭānuśravikā viṣayā daśa eteṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ sampadamanunandanti vipadaṃ nānumodantyeṣo 'ṣṭādaśavidho vikalpastāmisro /
GSP31iskgaudu:799: eva kiṃtu viṣayasampattau sambhogakāle ya eva mriyate 'ṣṭaguṇaiśvaryādvā bhraśyate

GSP31iskgaudu:805: bhavantyaśakteśca karaṇavaikalyādaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā ityuddiṣṭaṃ tatraikādaśendriyavadhāḥ bādhiryamandhatāprasuptirupahvikāghrāṇapāko mūkatā kuṇitvaṃ khāṃjyaṃ klaibyamunmāda iti /

GSP31iskgaudu:945: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgartti kālo hi duratikramaḥ //
GSP31iskgaudu:946: ” vyaktamavyaktapuruṣāstrayaḥ padārthāstena kālo 'ntarbhūto 'sti sa vyaktaḥ sarvakartṛtvāt kālasyāpi pradhānameva kāraṇaṃ svabhāvo 'pyatraiva līnaḥ tasmāt kālo na kāraṇam /
GSP31iskgaudu:948: tasmāt prakṛtireva kāraṇaṃ na prakṛteḥ kāraṇāntaramastīti /
GSP31iskgaudu:950: ataḥ prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ subhogyataraṃ na kiñcidīśvarādikāraṇamastīti me matirbhavati // 61 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:953: tasmānna badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31iskgaudu:954: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31iskgaudu:955: tasmāt kāraṇāt puruṣo na badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati yasmāt kāraṇāt prakṛtireva
GSP31iskgaudu:958: atha mukta eva svabhāvāt sa sarvagataśca kathaṃ saṃsaratyaprāptaprāpaṇārthaṃ saṃsaraṇamiti
GSP31iskgaudu:959: tena puruṣo badhyate puruṣo mucyate saṃsarati vyapadiśyate yena saṃsāritvaṃ na vidyate
GSP31iskgaudu:961: tadabhivyakto kevalaḥ śuddho muktaḥ svarūpapratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:962: atra yadi puruṣasya bandho nasti tato mokṣo 'pi nāsti /
GSP31iskgaudu:963: atrocyate prakṛtirevātmānaṃ badhnāti mocayati ca yatra sūkṣmaśarīraṃ tanmātrakaṃ trividhakaraṇopetaṃ tat trividhena bandhena badhyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:964: uktaṃ ca prākṛtena ca bandhena tathā vaikārikeṇa ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:967: prakṛtiśca badhyate prakṛtiśca mucyate saṃsaratīti kathaṃ taducyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:969: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ prati vimocayatyekarūpeṇa // ISk_63 //
GSP31iskgaudu:970: rūpaiḥ saptabhirevaitāni sapta procyante dharmo vairāgyamaiśvaryamadharmo 'jñānamavairāgyamanaiśvaryyametāni
GSP31iskgaudu:971: prakṛteḥ saptarūpāṇi tairātmānaṃ svaṃ badhnāti prakṛtirātmānaṃ svameva saiva prakṛtiḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:972: puruṣasyārthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ karttavya iti vimocayatyātmānamekarūpeṇa jñānena // 63 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:976: evamuktena kramena pañcaviṃśatitattvālocanābhyāsādiyaṃ prakṛtirayaṃ puruṣa etāni
GSP31iskgaudu:977: pañcatanmātrendriyamahābhūtānīti puruṣasya jñānamutpadyate nāsti nāhameva bhavāmi
GSP31iskgaudu:979: viparyayaḥ saṃśayo 'viparyayādasaṃśayādviśuddhaṃ kevalaṃ tadeva nānyadastīti mokṣakāraṇamutpadyate
GSP31iskgaudu:983: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31iskgaudu:984: tena viśuddhena kevalajñānena puruṣaḥ prakṛtiṃ paśyati prekṣakavat prekṣakeṇa tulyamavasthitaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:985: svastho yathā raṃgaprekṣako 'vasthito narttakīṃ paśyatiḥ svasthaḥ svasmiṃstiṣṭhati
GSP31iskgaudu:987: kathaṃbhūtāṃ prakṛtiṃ nivṛttaprasavāṃ nivṛttaḥ buddhyahaṃkārakāryyānarthavaśāt saptarūpavinivṛttāṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:989: tebhyaḥ saptabhyo rūpebhyo vinivṛttiṃ prakṛtiṃ paśyati // 65 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:992: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31iskgaudu:993: raṃgastha iti yathā raṃgastha ityevamupekṣaka ekaḥ kevalaḥ śuddhaḥ puruṣastenāhaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:994: dṛṣṭeti kṛtvā uparatā nivṛtā ekā ekaiva prakṛtiḥ trailokyasyāpi pradhānakāraṇabhūtā
GSP31iskgaudu:995: na dvitīyā prakṛtirasti mūrttibhede jātibhedādevaṃ prakṛtipuruṣayornirvṛttāvapi vyāpakatvāt
GSP31iskgaudu:996: saṃyogo 'sti na tu saṃyogāt kutaḥ sargo bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:997: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ sarvagatatvāt satyapi saṃyoge prayojanaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:999: ubhayatrāpi caritārthatvāt sargasya nāsti prayojanaṃ yaḥ punaḥ sarga iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:1000: yathā dānagrahaṇanimitta uttamarṇādhamarṇayordravyaviśuddhau satyapi saṃyoge na kaścidarthasambandho bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:1002: yadi puruṣasyotpanne jñāne mokṣo bhāti tato mama kasmānna bhavatīti / ata ucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:1005: yadyapi pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati tathāpi saṃskāravaśāddhṛtaśarīro
GSP31iskgaudu:1006: yogī tiṣṭhati kathaṃ cakrabhramavaccakrabhrameṇa tulyaṃ yathā kulālaścakraṃ bhramayitvā
GSP31iskgaudu:1007: ghaṭaṃ karoti mṛtpiṇḍaṃ cakramāropya punaḥ kṛtvā ghaṭaṃ paryāmuñcati cakraṃ bhramatyeva
GSP31iskgaudu:1009: etāni sapta rūpāṇi bandhanabhūtāni samyagjñānena dagdhāni yathā nāgninā dagdhāni
GSP31iskgaudu:1010: bījāni prarohaṇasamarthānyevametāni dharmādīni bandhanāni na samarthāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:1012: kasmānna bhavati varttamānatvādeva kṣaṇāntare kṣayamapyeti jñānaṃ tvanāgatakarma
GSP31iskgaudu:1013: dahati varttamānaśarīreṇa ca yat karoti tadapīti vihitānuṣṭhānakaraṇāditi saṃskārakṣayāccharīrapāte mokṣaḥ // 67 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31iskgaudu:1017: dharmādharmajanitasaṃskārakṣayāt prāpte śarīrabhede caritārthatvāt pradhānasya nivṛttau
GSP31iskgaudu:1022: puruṣārtho mokṣastadarthaṃ jñānamidaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ paramarṣiṇā śrīkapilarṣiṇā
GSP31iskgaudu:1023: samākhyātaṃ samyaguktaṃ yatra jñāne bhūtānāṃ vaikārikāṇāṃ sthityutpattipralayā avasthānāvirbhāvatirobhāvāścintyante
GSP31iskgaudu:1024: vicāryante yeṣāṃ vicārāt samyak pañcaviṃśatitattvavivecanātmikā sampadyate saṃvittiriti // 69 //
GSP31iskgaudu:1029: āsurirapi pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
